actions.committee: Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to authorize appropriations for the fiscal years 1979 and 1980 for certain maritime programs of the Department of Commerce, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Maritime Appropriation Act - Authorizes appropriations in specified amounts to the Department of Commerce for fiscal years 1979 and 1980 for: (1) vessel construction or reconditioning; (2) the payment of obligations incurred for the operating - differential subsidy; (3) research and development expenses; (4) operating expenses including reserve fleet expenses; (5) financial assistance to State marine schools; and (6) the Merchant Marine Academy.

titles.title: A bill to authorize appropriations for the fiscal years 1979 and 1980 for certain maritime programs of the Department of Commerce, and for other purposes.
